document_data.name: Bloody Sash
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bloody Sash''' was a temple dedicated to [[Ilmater]] located within the fortified city of [[Yeshpek]] on the [[Lake of Steam]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The temple, and Ilmater's worship in general, was unpopular in Yeshpek as the clergy preached that the goods produced within the city should be made as cheaply as possible to lower prices and increase affordability. Their teaching fell mostly on deaf ears.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Bloody Sash was run by Reverend Mother [[Hervanda Suulrath]].
